attributes.background: Giving animals away on the free advertising on gumtree these animals could end up as bait. Please help me to stop Gumtree advertising free animals

rejection.details:
The decision about whether to host adverts for free animals is a matter for Gumtree, which is a private company.

You could try contacting Gumtree directly to ask them to change their policy.

Alternatively, you could start a petition asking Parliament to pass a law restricting the sale or giving away of animals on the internet. You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
